item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Typically, YTMND are just a static image, or animated gif, with looping audio. If you're not getting the audio, maybe a browser plugin is blocking it? I have NoScript and Adblock Plus (both set to disallow YTMND) and I still get the audio.
So I dunno, you'll have to trust me -- it's pretty funny with the deadpan delivery.
item.content:encoded:
Typically, YTMND are just a static image, or animated gif, with looping audio. If you’re not getting the audio, maybe a browser plugin is blocking it? I have NoScript and Adblock Plus (both set to disallow YTMND) and I still get the audio.

So I dunno, you’ll have to trust me — it’s pretty funny with the deadpan delivery.
